channel.title: Puzzle – GAME ONLINE
channel.description: GAME ACRADE - HTML5 FREE PLAY ONLINE

item.title: Rotating Rubiks Cube
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Rotating Rubiks Cube is an innovative Tetris game. It’s different from the traditional Tetris. You need to drop the given square vertically onto the rotating platform and support the platform to succeed. Successfully building a complete square frame can eliminate the score. Every landing square, the platform will be rotated. Do you want to challenge […]
item.content:encoded:
Rotating Rubiks Cube is an innovative Tetris game. It’s different from the traditional Tetris. You need to drop the given square vertically onto the rotating platform and support the platform to succeed. Successfully building a complete square frame can eliminate the score. Every landing square, the platform will be rotated. Do you want to challenge for high marks?
Use the mouse or your finger to play.

item.title: Run Around Online
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: The busy stickman opens his busy cycle of life again, lifts his briefcase and rushes to the next goal! In this game, you play a busy matchmaker, running crazily in the circle, avoiding obstacles carefully, and passing through the whole circle. How many passes can you get through? But notice that obstacles are not necessarily […]
item.content:encoded:
The busy stickman opens his busy cycle of life again, lifts his briefcase and rushes to the next goal! In this game, you play a busy matchmaker, running crazily in the circle, avoiding obstacles carefully, and passing through the whole circle. How many passes can you get through? But notice that obstacles are not necessarily as quiet as you think.
Tap and hold to jump higher.

item.title: Go Escape
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Go Escape is a skillful and brain relaxation game in fact. If you just tap to start without any thoughts about the rational path, you are hardly able to pass the latter levels. So if you want to pass every latter level like first one, please plan a route before loosing the organ device. Show […]
item.content:encoded:
Go Escape is a skillful and brain relaxation game in fact. If you just tap to start without any thoughts about the rational path, you are hardly able to pass the latter levels. So if you want to pass every latter level like first one, please plan a route before loosing the organ device. Show me your perfact route choice and subtle operation!
Use the mouse or your finger to play.

item.title: Pick Me Up
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: There is an arcade game called Pick Me Up. You are a taxi driver looking for business on the street. Although your pathes are all desighed at the beginning, it is still not quite simple for you to finish the path and complete all the orders from passengers. All you have to concentrate on is […]
item.content:encoded:
There is an arcade game called Pick Me Up. You are a taxi driver looking for business on the street. Although your pathes are all desighed at the beginning, it is still not quite simple for you to finish the path and complete all the orders from passengers. All you have to concentrate on is the real-time traffic status. As you can see, the only difficulty in this game is the timing of crossing the road. Are you able to finish all the orders from passengers and earn the reward?
Use mouse or tap to play.

item.title: AMAZE
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Amaze is another drawing game with relaxing gameplay and a few skills. The only goal in each level is to fill in all blank positions with your ball. Unfortunately, you are forbidded to make any curve pathes. Have fun playing with simple operation and gradient difficulty.Use mouse or tap to play.
item.content:encoded:
Amaze is another drawing game with relaxing gameplay and a few skills. The only goal in each level is to fill in all blank positions with your ball. Unfortunately, you are forbidded to make any curve pathes. Have fun playing with simple operation and gradient difficulty.
Use mouse or tap to play.

item.title: Light It Up
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Light It Up is an arcade game with both puzzle elements and special operation skills. As a player who is ready to challenge himself should know how to balance collecting stars and complete the current level. All the harder levels are forcing players to make a choise. The game itself has limited difficulty thanks to […]
item.content:encoded:
Light It Up is an arcade game with both puzzle elements and special operation skills. As a player who is ready to challenge himself should know how to balance collecting stars and complete the current level. All the harder levels are forcing players to make a choise. The game itself has limited difficulty thanks to the path you choose.
Use mouse or tap to play.

item.title: Cute Folding Paper
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Cute Folding Paper is a casual logic kids game. Your origami skills will grow with every fold in this brain-stimulating puzzle adventure. Master each folded creation to crack the code and unfold the next mind-bending puzzle. Are you ready to test your logic?On pcClick to fold.On mobile and tabletClick to fold.
item.content:encoded:
Cute Folding Paper is a casual logic kids game. Your origami skills will grow with every fold in this brain-stimulating puzzle adventure. Master each folded creation to crack the code and unfold the next mind-bending puzzle. Are you ready to test your logic?
On pcClick to fold.On mobile and tabletClick to fold.

item.title: Mahjong Sort Puzzle
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Mahjong Sort Puzzle is a brain online game. You sort out the mahjong, sort out the mahjong with the same color into a grid and they will all be eliminated.On PCClick or tap to play.On MobileTap to play.
item.content:encoded:
Mahjong Sort Puzzle is a brain online game. You sort out the mahjong, sort out the mahjong with the same color into a grid and they will all be eliminated.
On PCClick or tap to play.On MobileTap to play.

item.title: Puzzle Box – Brain Fun
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Puzzle Box – Brain Fun is a brain game containing multiple modes. You will face various intellectual challenges to exercise your brain and improve your IQ! Here are various popular puzzle games, such as find out, hair transplant, jigsaw, and matching games. Different levels of difficulty and gameplay are waiting for you to unlock!On PCClick […]
item.content:encoded:
Puzzle Box – Brain Fun is a brain game containing multiple modes. You will face various intellectual challenges to exercise your brain and improve your IQ! Here are various popular puzzle games, such as find out, hair transplant, jigsaw, and matching games. Different levels of difficulty and gameplay are waiting for you to unlock!
On PCClick or drag the target objects to play.On MobileClick or drag the target objects to play.

item.title: 2048 Cube Shooting Merge
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: 2048 Cube Shooting Merge is a casual puzzle game. Merge the number blocks, bounce, and merge the blocks to get a new number block. This game is in 3D with crazy fun physics!On PCSlide the block to play.On MobileSlide the block to play.
item.content:encoded:
2048 Cube Shooting Merge is a casual puzzle game. Merge the number blocks, bounce, and merge the blocks to get a new number block. This game is in 3D with crazy fun physics!
On PCSlide the block to play.On MobileSlide the block to play.
